text: In Waves is the fifth album from the American metalcore band Trivium. It was released on August 2, 2011 through Roadrunner Records. The album contained more metalcore elements rather than thrash metal elements. ==Track listing== ===Singles=== # "In Waves" - Released May 21, 2011 # "Built to Fall" - Released August 16, 2011 # "Black" - Released January 23, 2012 # "Watch The World Burn" - Released November 16, 2012 ===Album=== ==References== Category:Heavy metal albums Category:2011 albums Category:Roadrunner Records albums
title: In Waves
